title: Espresso Developer Tour
description: A modular roadmap to help developers explore Espresso’s core features and real-world applications.

sections.title: What is Espresso?
sections.summary: Espresso is a modular infrastructure layer that enables fast confirmations, pluggable sequencing, and composable data availability for rollups.

popup.title: Modular by Design
popup.content: Espresso isn't a rollup. It's what powers your rollup — confirmation, sequencing, and availability all as plug-in components.

sections.title: What is Confirmed?
sections.summary: HotShot lets rollups confirm transactions with BFT finality in ~10 seconds — critical for bridges, intent systems, and trustless UX.
